title: 日本淺草觀音寺一百籤第三十一籤
poem: 鯤鯨未變時,且守碧潭溪,風雲興巨浪,一息過天涯

analysis.zh: 這首詩的主題是關於潛在的轉變與堅持等待的旅程。詩中以「鯤鯨未變時」比喻尚未展現潛能的存在，接著說「且守碧潭溪」暗示此時正靜守於自己的境界，耐心等待時機。風雲興巨浪描繪了外在環境的激盪與變化，代表外在挑戰與機會的激烈。最後一句「一息過天涯」則傳達只要把握那一刻，便能突破界限、飛越極限，完成自我超越。整體來說，詩句勸勉人們在沉穩中保持耐心，等候適時的轉折，最終才能展現宏偉的願景。
analysis.en: This poem's theme revolves around latent transformation and the patient journey of awaiting a decisive moment. The line "鯤鯨未變時" (the great fish has not yet changed) symbolizes potential that remains dormant. "且守碧潭溪" (while guarding the blue pool) conveys a state of calm vigilance, waiting for the right time. The imagery of "風雲興巨浪" (wind and clouds stir up massive waves) represents turbulent external forces and the intensity of opportunity and challenge. Finally, "一息過天涯" (a single breath passes beyond the horizon) suggests that once the opportune moment is seized, one can break limits and achieve self‑transcendence. The poem encourages steady patience, waiting for the right turning point, and ultimately realizing great aspirations.
analysis.jp: この詩の主題は、潜在的な変容とその変容を待ち続ける旅路にあります。「鯤鯨未変時」はまだ形を変えていない巨大魚を象徴し、潜在力が未だ発揮されていないことを示します。「且守碧潭溪」は静かに自らの境地を守り、適切な時期を待つ姿勢を表します。「風雲興巨浪」は外界の激動と機会の激しさを描き、挑戦とチャンスの波を象徴しています。最後の「一息過天涯」は、瞬間を掴めば限界を超えて遥か遠くへ飛び去れるという意味です。全体として、静かな忍耐と適切な転換点を待ち、最終的に壮大な願望を実現することを勧める内容です。

rag_analysis:
According to the poem, the core meaning is:
• The narrator is in a state of latent potential, symbolised by the yet‑unchanged Kun‑Gong fish.
• The line “and guard the blue pool” portrays a calm, patient watch over one’s own realm while awaiting a favourable turn.
• The rising wind and stormy waves depict external turbulence and opportunity, urging readiness for change.
• The final image “a breath passes beyond the horizon” conveys that a single decisive moment can break boundaries and realise one’s aspirations.
• Overall, the verse encourages steady patience, vigilance, and seizing the right moment to achieve transcendence.
